knimeNode.name: Margin Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns a score for a class probability distribution based on the margin between the two classes with the highest probability.

fullDescription.intro: Uncertainty Sampling Scorer that assigns a score to a class probability distribution based on the margin between the two classes with the highest probability. Note that a high score means a low margin between class probabilities.
fullDescription.option: Select all columns containing that are part of the class probability distribution.

ports.inPort: Unlabeled data with class probability distribution
